Bylaws of SYSTRAN SAS were updated.

entities.name: Shareholders of SYSTRAN SAS
entities.description: Bear losses up to contributions; shares give proportional rights to profits, assets, and liquidation dividends; voting rights proportional to capital, one vote per share, with some exclusions (e.g., contributor in kind, beneficiary of special benefit, or right to subscription).

Key leadership role at SYSTRAN SAS, responsible for representing, directing, and administering the company. Appointed by the Board of Directors. Term can be limited or unlimited, or a renewable period of three years. Can be removed by the Board of Directors at any time without reasonable ground. Responsibilities include drawing up an annual report, representing the company in dealings with third parties, and granting delegations of powers. Remuneration is determined by the Board of Directors. This position can be held by a natural person or a corporate entity.
A natural person who may be appointed as President of SYSTRAN SAS.

entities.name: Corporate President
entities.description: A corporate entity that may be appointed as President of SYSTRAN SAS. When appointed, it must mandatorily appoint a natural person as its permanent representative.
A natural person mandatorily appointed by a Corporate President to act as its permanent representative for SYSTRAN SAS.
The position held by a natural person when a corporate entity serves as President of SYSTRAN SAS.
